stimulusHtml: Like other paintings of the Northern Renaissance, the work shown differs from Italian paintings of the same period in that it shows

choicesHtml: more concern for unified lighting and less for the narrative moment
a greater emphasis on anatomical accuracy and less interest in drapery
more emphasis on wealth and status and less on religious piety or humility
greater interest in the depiction of details and less concern for perspective
